verse.name: v1
verse.lines: For you have set me free newline You're all that I seek newline Your love completes my life newline You're the air that I breathe

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: And the savior of the world newline Is the reason I live newline And I will sing, I will sing

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: And I will lift my voice newline to the one who has saved me newline I will sing, I will sing.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: And I'll cry out for more newline Saying Lord, I need you newline I will reach out newline I'm reaching for more of you in my heart

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: And I will wait on you in the stillness lord newline listen for your voice, pure as gold refined newline In your presence lord here is where I belong
